blocks.subject: RE: Just a thought
text: I had the same thought after we submitted our list.  Will include her next year. thx. kd

blocks.subject: Just a thought  On the whole promoting our senior woman (things like Fortune) we really need to include Paula - she is one of the most senior women we have.
raw_header: To:	Palmer, Mark A. (PR); Denne, Karen
On the whole promoting our senior woman (things like Fortune) we really need to include Paula - she is one of the most senior women we have.
